attributes.action: Make cyclists take a driving test and make them pay VED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should cyclists get free road useage?

Most of them are a positive danger to other road users!

They should be made to take a test in line with cars and motorcyclists.

They should pay VED and display a tax disc.

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=cyclist&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=resign&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
